>
[Master Oracle Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=1858) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 152 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Expert Oracle Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=1857); Legendary in [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)

</column>

---

You gain the [master spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=170).
